pkgmetadata.longdescription: VPC Percentiles and Prediction Intervals // Perform a Visual Predictive Check (VPC), while accounting for stratification, censoring, and prediction correction. Using piping from 'magrittr', the intuitive syntax gives users a flexible and powerful method to generate VPCs using both traditional binning and a new binless approach Jamsen et al. (2018) doi:10.1002/psp4.12319 with Additive Quantile Regression (AQR) and Locally Estimated Scatterplot Smoothing (LOESS) prediction correction.
